text: "Thriving" is a 2019 song by Mary J. Blige featuring Nas. It went to number 21 on the Billboard Adult R&B; Songs chart. It was based on the sample of the 1967 song Under the Influence of Love by Love Unlimited. == Track listing == ==References== Category:2019 songs Category:Mary J. Blige songs Category:Nas songs
title: Thriving (song)
